name: Maple-Garlic Marinated Pork Tenderloin
author: LESLEYCAN
summary: A delicious, sweet marinade using real maple syrup. Great on chicken or pork tenderloin.
ingredients: fresh ground black pepper to taste
directions: Combine mustard, sesame oil, garlic, pepper, and maple syrup
Place pork in a shallow dish and coat thoroughly with marinade
Cover, then chill in the refrigerator at least eight hours, or overnight
Remove pork from marinade, and set aside
Transfer remaining marinade to a small saucepan, and cook on the stove over medium-low heat for 5 minutes
Brush grate with oil, and place meat on grate
Grill pork, basting with reserved marinade, for approximately 15 to 25 minutes, or until interior is no longer pink
Avoid using high temperatures as marinade will burn
